New: Performance Presets
You can now choose how the game trades off smoothness and sharpness vs battery.
  • Performance: smoother + sharper (uses more battery)
  • Balanced: recommended default
  • Battery: longest battery (lower FPS / lower internal resolution)
Change it anytime via Settings (gear) ‚Üí Quality.

Time Challenge
  • Start with 30s. Timer drains in real time.
  • Remove blocks to gain time: Yellow +3s, Teal +2s, Red +1s (plus base time).
  • Spin costs 1/3 of your remaining time.
  • Win by removing all blocks. Don't let the timer hit zero.
